member.name: P:NotifyIconSample.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NotifyIconSample.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:NotifyIconSample.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:NotifyIconSample.MainForm.btnTray_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Hide the main form, as a program running as a tray icon doesn't typically have a visible form.

member.name: M:NotifyIconSample.MainForm.timeZoneMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Using the TimeZone class display the name of the user's current timezone. The(Time Zone) class can also be used to determine if the user's location is currently using daylight savings time as well as the time that daylight savings time is active for a given time zone.

member.name: M:NotifyIconSample.MainForm.frameworkMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Grab the current .NET Framework Version. Outputs the Build, Major, Minor information. This information can also be accessed individually by properties.

member.name: M:NotifyIconSample.MainForm.restartMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Displays the amount of time that the machine has been up since last being rebooted. The time retrieved from TickCount is in Milliseconds. This is converted to minutes.

member.name: M:NotifyIconSample.MainForm.ntfSystemInfo_DoubleClick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the user double-clicks the tray icon, display the main form again. Also, make the tray icon disappear while the form is visible.
